original_text: And of the ten horns that were in his head, and of the other which came up, and before whom three fell; even of that horn that had eyes, and a mouth that spake very great things, whose look was more stout than his fellows.
korean_text: 또 그것의 머리에는 열 뿔이 있고 그 외에 또 다른 뿔이 나오매 세 뿔이 그 앞에서 빠졌으며 그 뿔에는 눈도 있고 큰 말을 하는 입도 있고 그 모양이 그의 동류보다 커 보이더라

sentences.original_text: and of the other which came up
even of that horn that had eyes
and a mouth that spake very great things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매우 큰 것들을 말하는 입에 대해

sentences.original_text: whose look was more stout than his fellows
